archimate:ArchimateDiagramModel.name: Capabilities
archimate:ArchimateDiagramModel.documentation:
An ability that an organization, person, or system possesses. Capabilities are typically expressed in general and high-level terms and typically require a combination of organization, people, processes, and technology to achieve.
An ability that an organization, person, or system possesses.
Note:
This a general-purpose definition. See Business Capability for how this concept is refined for usage in Business Architecture.
